about_the_game:
Thought of the Day: Success is measure in blood; yours or your enemy’s.
Indulge your bloodlust as never before! With massively increased frequency and size of blood effects, the Bloodpack DLC brings combat in Warhammer® 40,000® Dawn of War® II: Retribution™ to a new level of brutality. Subtlety be damned!


WARNING! This content is EXTREMELY bloody which can affect battle visibility when in combat. This option can be turned off from the Steam library-> > Dawn of War II - Retribution > Properties > Ridiculous Bloody Blood Pack > tick box (checked = on, unchecked = off)
detailed_description:
Thought of the Day: Success is measure in blood; yours or your enemy’s.
Indulge your bloodlust as never before! With massively increased frequency and size of blood effects, the Bloodpack DLC brings combat in Warhammer® 40,000® Dawn of War® II: Retribution™ to a new level of brutality. Subtlety be damned!


WARNING! This content is EXTREMELY bloody which can affect battle visibility when in combat. This option can be turned off from the Steam library-> > Dawn of War II - Retribution > Properties > Ridiculous Bloody Blood Pack > tick box (checked = on, unchecked = off)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit required)
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: The game requires a 1GB NVIDIA 6xx series graphics card or better, a 1GB AMD 6xxx series graphics card or better, or an Intel Iris Pro series card or better.
  • Additional Notes: NVIDIA cards require driver version 367.35 (tested), AMD and Intel cards require MESA 11.2 (tested)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit required)
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: The game requires a 2GB NVIDIA 9xx series graphics card or bette
  • Additional Notes: NVIDIA cards require driver version 367.35 (tested), AMD and Intel cards require MESA 11.2 (tested)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10.5
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Intel or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512Mb AMD 4850, 512Mb Nvidia GT130, Intel HD4000 (See Notes for more details)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar.
    • * All MacBook Airs released since Mid 2012 (1)
    • * All 13” MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012 (1)
    • * All 15” & 17" MacBook Pros released since Mid 2010 with a 512Mb graphics card or better
    • * All Mac Minis released since Late 2012 (1)
    • * All iMacs released since Early 2009 with a 512Mb graphics card or better
    • * All Mac Pros released since Early 2009
    • (1) Models with an Intel HD4000 or HD5000 graphics card require at least 8GB of System Memory
    ——— The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support.
    • * All MacBooks released since Early 2016
    —

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium IV 3.2Ghz, or any dual core processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB Video Card using Shader Model 3 (Nvidia GeForce 6600 GT / ATI X1600)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: indows XP SP2, Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor: Any Core 2 , Athlon X2, or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Video Card using Shader Model 3 (Nvidia GeForce 7800GT or any Nvidia GT200 series or better, ATI X1900 or any HD3600 series or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

With massively increased frequency and size of blood effects, the Bloodpack DLC brings combat in Warhammer® 40,000® Dawn of War® II: Retribution™ to a new level of brutality. Subtlety be damned!
